description:
Creates a sub folder in a parent Google Drive.
The parent folder should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com` and given `can edit` permission.

input.name: parent
input.description: The URL of the parent folder on Google Drive.

input.name: name
input.description: The name of the folder to create.

output.name: url
output.description: The Google Drive URL of the created folder.

output.name: id
output.description: The ID of the created folder.
